definition: (architecture) a slender upright spire at the top of a buttress of tower, raise on or as if on a pinnacle
details:
noun
- (architecture) a slender upright spire at the top of a buttress of tower
- a lofty peak
- the highest level or degree attainable
= synonyms: elevation
verb
- raise on or as if on a pinnacle
= example: raise on or as if on a pinnacle
- surmount with a pinnacle
= example: surmount with a pinnacle
